entry.title: Sassy Girl
entry.content:
#My Sassy Girl
1:You got coffee in cafe, not drink coke or orange juice

2: If she struck you, you just pretend feel too hurt, and if it is really hurt, you need pretend nothing

3:At the day of you have benn meeted one hundred days, you should give her a rose as a gift in her classromm, she’ll like it

4:If she felt uncomfortable about her shoes, you have to change them by your

5:She like writing, you gonna encourage her

6:I want meet a girl from furture, from my my furture

7:The destiny is building a brige between you and the people you love

8:What do you think about the moment that a woman is most beauty? take off all clothes
entry.summary:
#My Sassy Girl
1:You got coffee in cafe, not drink coke or orange juice

2: If she struck you, you just pretend feel too hurt

entry.title: three
entry.content:
• You want to start one thing sometimes, but you always say there is no place or emquipment that you have to need
    You want to play basketball well and you say there is no ball, there is no playground
    You want to sing well and you say there is no piano

  • You complained
    You feel dispirited even

  • Then
    Time flies!
    What happened? Nothing
    Beacuse you did nothing

  • At the same times you have spent
    The people who has the better condition than you
    The people like you
    The people even worse than you
    They done

  • You are still in origin place

  • Think about
    Do you love it
    What stop you

    You want to p

entry.title: Two
entry.content:
2020

:4

  • Framework 架构

  • Architecture 架构

  • Opacity 不透明性，模糊

  • Alignment 对齐

  • Animate 动画，动态

  • Parallel 平行的，同时的

  • Duration 持续时间

  • Configuration 配置，布局，构造，结构

  • Syntax 语法，句法

  • Implicit 隐式的，不直接言明的

  • Delegate 委托，代表，授权

  • Priority 优先级，优先地

  • Constraint 约束，限制

  • Scale 规模，比例

  • Appearance 外观，外貌

  • Drag 拖动

  • Clip 剪切

  • Paste 粘贴

  • Interaction 交互，交流，互动

  • Thread 线，线程

  • Multiplex 复用，多重

  • Map 映现，映射

  • DeadLock 死锁

  • Diagram 图，图表，示意图

  • View 视图

  • Inner 内部，内部的

  • Maintenance 维护

  • Oriented 使面向，使朝向

  • Advanced 高级（设置，选项）

  • Collaboration 合作，协作

:5

  • Collapse 重叠，折叠

  • Interval 间隔，时距

  • Radio 单选框

  • Checkbox 复选框

  • Prototype 原型，雏型

  • Thrashing 颠簸，抖动

  • Engine 引擎，发动机

  • Horizontal 水平的

  • Vertical 垂直的

  • Lateral 侧面的，横向的

  • Muscle 肌肉，威信

  • Semaphore 信号量，信号标

  • Oolong 乌龙茶

  • Filter 过滤，过滤器

  • Integrate 集成，合并

  • Separator 分隔符

  • Fragment 碎片，片段

  • Comment 评论，描述，批评

  • Register 登记，注册

  • Variant 变形，变体

  • Macro 宏指令

  • Meta-Object 元对象

  • Loop 回路，循环

  • Analogous 类似的

  • Outline 轮廓，大纲

  • Distinct 明显的，独特的
entry.summary:
2020

:4

  • Framework 架构

  • Architecture 架构

  • Opacity 不透明性，模糊

entry.title: One
entry.content:
• Those times you work hard

  • Those times you don’t wanna get up early but never give up

  • That is actually the dream

    -For kobe bryant

  • I was most working in a virtual world

  • I don’t believe the code change the world

  • I think the people change the world

if you were in a bad situation, why not enjoy this sonnet

  • Shall I compare thee to a summer’s day?

  • Thou art more lovely and more temperate:

  • Rough winds do shake the darling buds of May,

  • And summer’s lease hath all too short a date:

  • Sometime too hot the eye of heaven shines,

  • And often is his gold complexion dimmed,

  • And, every fair from fair sometime declines,

  • By chance,or nature’s changing course untrimmed;

  • But thy eternal summer shall not fade,

  • Nor lose possession of that fair thou ow’st,

  • Nor shall death brag thou wander stis his shade

  • When in eternal lines to time thou grow’st,

  • So long as men can breathe or eyes can see,

  • So long lives this, and this gives life to thee.

    -For William Shakespeare

haha, I know you are confused

but Life is tough sometimes, right? we need be kind to him(her)
entry.summary:
• Those times you work hard

  • Those times you don’t wanna get up early but never give up
